metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4543 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw named "EntryBleed" was found in the Linux Kernel Page TableIsolation (KPTI). This issue could allow a local attacker to leak KASLRbase via prefetch side-channels based on TLB timing for Intel systems.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
